Noah's Story

I have completed the academic requirements of a Master of Data Science at Deakin University and now am looking for a full-time data science position that will fulfil the professional practice (placement) component. My undergraduate degree was a Bachelor of Science at Monash University, with a major in astrophysics and a minor in mathematics.

My study has provided me with a unique skillset, blending science, mathematics, and information technology. Since the completion of my undergraduate degree and my decision to pursue a data science career, I have spent much of my free time developing my skills on projects which can be found below. I have also had the opportunity to take a lead role in the development of a sentiment analysis service that will see commercial implementation for a university partner client. I am technically proficient, have good communication and problem-solving skills, enjoy being challenged, and am equally comfortable in both independent and colloborative roles.

Technical Skills

  • Python, R, FORTRAN, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • SQL server, Relational Database
  • Data Visualisation, Tableau
  • Advanced Linux, Windows
  • Git, Bitbucket
  • Advance MS Office
  • Frequentist and Bayesian Statistics, Algebra
  • Data modelling and analysis
  • Good communication skills
  • Scientific methodology
  • Strong problem-solving skills
